item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
Jessica add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?" -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How do you spell 'love'?" - Piglet "You don't spell it...you feel it." - Pooh" -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "It is hard to be brave, when you're only a Very Small Animal." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Parker J. Palmer
item.description: "The highest form of love is the love that allows for intimacy without the annihilation of difference." -- Parker J. Palmer

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There comes a time when silence is betrayal." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Have you any notion how many books are written about women in the course of one year? Have you any notion how many are written by men? Are you aware that you are, perhaps, the most discussed animal in the universe?" -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jessica add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss
